entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 28. Wind chill near minus 45. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 24.

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 24. POP 60%
